channel.title: What do I do now?
channel.description:
So I've been learning java for some time now and I consider myself pretty proficient in it. I can bang out the solution to a programming problem in my head faster than I can type it all out. My problem is that I don't know where to go from here. I know a mess of unrelated topics like data structures, simulation, some java bytecode, compression algorithms, etc., but I have yet to actually create anything useful with my programming knowledge.
What should I focus on learning now and how should I go about learning it?
I'd appreciate any input that you guys have. Any books, tutorials, code, etc. that you can give.
Thanks.

item.title: What do I do now?
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

I think that when you understand the basics, it’s important to start to learn about class file structure. It really gives you a much greater depth of understanding. I would suggest creating a class file parser - as well as gaining knowledge about class structure, you’ll get to know the DataInputStream class really well.

Read full topic

item.title: What do I do now?
item.dc:creator: @oddinn686 oddinn686
item.description:
@oddinn686 wrote:

Hey thanks for the responses guys. I’m not a big fan of making games though, it just seems too trivial to me. The irc bot sounds like an ok idea. I may look into that a little bit more.

@Galook- what are the programming competitions that you mentioned. I’m definitely interested in looking into those.

I’m still looking for some direction. I’d really like to hear from some more advanced java programmers like mopar, pplsuqbawlz, iamadam, etc., to find out what they did when they got to the point that I am at.

Thanks again everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: What do I do now?
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

“find a random game on the net and make a program to play it for u”: interesting

Hey, can you tell me how to force the mouse to be pressed?

Say hello to a “Helicopter Game” bot

SO, someone pleas eanswer my question

Read full topic

item.title: What do I do now?
item.dc:creator: @Galook Galook
item.description:
@Galook wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Well, I have an obbsession with IRC bots. Make one

That’s what i do atm

with irc bots, you can do alot of things, and practice data structires/OOP

Fun Stuff to do:
find a random game on the net and make a program to play it for u
make irc bots
make a game
teach someone else to program, it perfects your basics if they ask alot of questions
there are also programming competitions online you could do, i did those for a while

I recommend the irc bot though… but thats only if you already use irc

Read full topic
